content.paragraph: This research aims to understand how urban residents interact with and experience their city environments. Through a combination of structured surveys and AI-driven interviews, we collect valuable insights about mobility patterns, housing preferences, and urban life quality.

Your participation helps urban planners and policymakers better understand the needs of city residents. All data collected will be anonymized and used solely for research purposes at the City Science Initiative.
The study consists of multiple components, including a demographic survey, structured questionnaires about urban experiences, and an innovative AI-driven interview that adapts to your responses.
Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. All responses are encrypted and stored securely, and you may withdraw from the study at any time.
